"Weapon Guide (Talis)":
"\"Weapon Guide\"(Talis),
After a PA is used,the talis will be deployed in the air in a formation. While in that state,
if a technique is activated, special long-range bullets will be fired.

Depending on which PA is used, the formation will change."

"PA\"Perforated Shoot\"
will fire a photon bullet and deploy the Talis at a distance.

If a tech is used during this Talis deployment,
a photon bullet will be fired with that used tech's attribute."
